title: Temperature and School Discipline: First Look
text: How much does the climate of a classroom depend on the climate outside? Using a dataset of school discipline referrals and historical weather patterns, this post visualizes the ‘heat-discipline’ link. Below, I’ll walk through the data cleaning process and present initial exploratory plots that highlight how extreme heat days differ from the seasonal norm (pretending i am a researcher who into this topic!)
